Name: Department of Integration
Content:
(a) (1) SUMMARY OF THIS ACT.â€”
This bill establishes a Department of Integration to immerse new members into the nation; and, establishes the responsibilities of the DOI under the MOF
























1. Creates a Department under the MOF

   1. Creates a Department that helps guide new people through the FAQ and create a guide for more information about several topics (e.g. the government, the economy, etc.)
   2. Offers funds to new people after their creation of an account through the Spook Vooper website in the amount of 5,000 credits, and a group will be created to hold and track those funds. 
       B) Recruitment to the Department
   1. Anyone can volunteer to be in this Department but must be approved by the head of the MOF. The head of the MOF also reserves the right to pass the approval process onto anyone in the MOF.
   2. The MOF can remove you from the DOI at any time if they suspect wrongdoing or inactivity. 
       C) Funding

              1. The volunteers of the DOI will ask for donations throughout the active community and will request funding from the federal government.
